arts.ttl: Sebastian Berhalter, Pedro Vite spark second-half surge as Whitecaps top Minnesota United 3-1
arts.sum: Sebastian Berhalter started the scoring 10 minutes into the second half and Pedro Vite added two goals four minutes apart to propel the Vancouver Whitecaps to a 3-1 victory over Minnesota United on Sunday. Berhalter subbed in to begin the second half and scored for the first time this season to give the Whitecaps a 1-0 lead in the 55th minute.

arts.ttl: Preview: Minnesota United vs. Vancouver Whitecaps - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Major League Soccer clash between Minnesota United and Vancouver Whitecaps, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
